divs: Sighting DetailsIn July got born again in church feeling like beings doing surgury on me at night being followed by Govt, have been hit by bullets seing my self outside myself like a walkin inside of me, being tortured by these beings, feeling like soul and spirit outside of body with handcuffs and tape all over me nighttime seeing needles all over me with alien writing on them and serum inside of me. They are trying to capture my soul and annointing power of the spirit inside of me seeing space like quaranteeine around a 20 feet radius aound me, my life is in dangr please pray for me Michael Thanks. Seeing 20 FT Ufo following me and triangel like black aircraft also seeing remote viewers trying to tap inside of my spiritman to take the annointing of God over. Thanks.
Summary: Have seen 4 UFO Being experimented on at night terrified
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were 2 other sightings in Portland on or around July 1st 2011
